header.name: Vanilla Mob Variants V2.6
header.description:
Randomised mob textures, tints, sizes, and more!
Multiple pack presets - click the gear icon
Updates and feature voting on the §9discord§r
 - by xanion

subpacks.name:
§lCustom§r 
Use your own personal textures. 
Replace the texture files in the 'v' and 'c' folders!

§lCommunity Unlimited§r 
Want a little bit more than plain old vanilla? 
Here's ALL the community's textures!

§lPure Vanilla§r 
No textures, just tint and size variants. 
Good when using other texture packs!

§lSimple Vanilla§r 
Tint, size, texture variants. 
Sticks very close to the original art style!

§lCommunity Vanilla§r 
Tint, size, texture variants. 
Vanilla defined by the discord community!
